snippet: Yahoo is poised to announce changes to its board, including the addition of Max Levchin, a former senior executive at PayPal.
abstract: Yahoo is poised to announce changes to its board, including the addition of Max Levchin, a former senior executive at PayPal.
lead_paragraph: Yahoo is poised to announce changes to its board, including the addition of Max Levchin, a former senior executive at PayPal. Read more »

headline.main: Yahoo Said to Plan Board Shake-Up, Adding Levchin
